ArmUs.hpp File Reference

This class controls the arm. It contains a ArmUs Info object that sends commands to the motor translator to make the arm move and a Controller object that contains information about the controller used to control the arm. More...

class  ArmUs

const int ROS_RATE = 50
 

Detailed Description

This class controls the arm. It contains a ArmUs Info object that sends commands to the motor translator to make the arm move and a Controller object that contains information about the controller used to control the arm.
